title: Ключі від правди
overview: "Keys to the Truth" is a gripping detective series where every secret hides a deep personal drama. Valeria, a seasoned investigator, is forced to leave the service after the tragic death of her brother, who was wrongly accused of a crime. Losing faith in the system, she launches her own investigation, which leads her to a luxurious hotel hiding dark intrigues, lies, and crimes behind its elegant walls. The path to truth proves to be more dangerous than she ever expected. She's not just searching for the culprit — she's fighting for the truth that could change everything.
